subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer suspended Red Bulls defender Armando for two games for “endangering the safety of an opponent” in the 94th minute of New York’s 2-2 tie at Houston on July 4.
snippet: Major League Soccer suspended Red Bulls defender Armando for two games for “endangering the safety of an opponent” in the 94th minute of New York’s 2-2 tie at Houston on July 4.
